item.title: US-20/US-26 West at WY-257/To WY-220
item.description: US-20/US-26 West at WY-257/To WY-220 (Casper West Belt Loop) and Bus. US-20/Bus. US-26 (not signed). Turn right to continue west on US-20/US-26 to Shoshoni.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at WY-257/To WY-220 and Bus. US-20/Bus. US-26
item.description: US-20/US-26 West at WY-257/To WY-220 and Bus. US-20/Bus. US-26 (not marked) in Casper. Use right lane to continue west on US-20/US-26 to Shoshoni. Continue straight for WY-257/To WY-220 which is the Casper West Belt Route.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 189
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 189 - US-20/US-26 West/To WY-220/Shoshoni/Port of Entry. Continue north on I-25/US-87 to Midwest and Buffalo. US-20/US-26 West leave I-25 northbound.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 188B and 189
item.description: I-25 North at Exit 188B - Poplar St (WY-220). Approaching Exit 189 - US-20/US-26 West/To WY-220/Rawlins - Shoshoni. WY-220 is routed along Poplar St. but through traffic on WY-220, towards Rawlins, is encouraged to use Exit 189 and to follow US-20/US-26 and the West Casper Belt Route to bypass downtown Casper.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 188A and 188B
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 188A - Center St (BL-25/Bus. US-87). Approaching Exit 188B - Poplar St (WY-220). Poplar Street used to have the WY-220 shield on the exit, until the eastern Casper bypass was completed. WY-220 traffic is encouraged to continue north on I-25 to Exit 189 and to follow US-20/US-26 and WY-257.

item.title: WY-220 East Approaching WY-257
item.description: WY-220 East approaching WY-257. WY-257 is a bypass around the west side of Casper. Use WY-257 north for I-25/US-20/US-26/US-87 to Sheridan (via I-25 North), Cheyenne (via I-25 South) and Shoshoni (via US-20/US-26 West).

item.title: WY-220 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WY-220 east. Distance to Alcova and Casper.

item.title: US-287 South/WY-789 South at WY-220
item.description: US-287 South/WY-789 South at WY-220 in Carbon County. Turn right to continue south on US-287/WY-789 to Rawlins; turn left for WY-220 East to Casper.

item.title: US-287/WY-789/WY-220 Closed When Lights Flashing
item.description: US-287/WY-789 Closed to Rawlins and WY-220 Closed to Casper when Lights Flashing at junction of US-287/WY-789 and WY-220.

item.title: US-287/WY-789 South at WY-220
item.description: US-287/WY-789 South at WY-220 in Carbon County. Turn right to continue south on US-287/WY-789 to Rawlins. Use WY-220 East to Casper.

item.title: End WY-220 West At US-287/WY-789
item.description: End WY-220 West at US-287/WY-789. Use US-287/WY-789 North for Lander; use US-287/WY-789 South for Rawlins.

item.title: End WY-220 West at US-287/WY-789
item.description: End WY-220 west at US-287/WY-789 in Muddy Gap Junction.

item.title: WY-220 West - Muddy Gap Junction
item.description: WY-220 West at Muddy gap Junction.

item.title: WY-220 West Approaching US-287/WY-789
item.description: WY-220 West approaching US-287/WY-789. This is a non standard Wyoming junction sign that is in black and white.

item.title: WY-220 West at WY-487
item.description: WY-220 west at WY-487 south to Medicine Bow. Continue west on WY-220 for Alcova and Rawlins.

item.title: WY-220 West at WY-487 South
item.description: WY-220 west at WY-487 south.

item.title: WY-220 West Approaching WY-258
item.description: WY-220 West (CY Ave) approaching WY-258 (Wyoming Blvd). WY-258 is the belt line across the south side of Casper.

item.title: WY-220 West at Business US-20/Business US-26
item.description: WY-220 west at Business US-20/Business US-26 (1st Ave) in Casper.

item.title: I-25 North Exit 188B at WY-220
item.description: I-25 North at Exit 188B, WY-220 Jct. Turn left for WY-220 West towards S. Poplar St., Fort Casper, and Nicolaysen Art Museum. Turn north on Poplar St. for the Casper Planetarium.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 188B and 189
item.description: I-25 North at Exit 188B - WY-220 West/Poplar St. Approaching Exit 189 - US-20/US-26 West/Shoshoni. Continue north on I-25/US-87 North for Midwest.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 188A and 188B
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 188A - Center St. Approaching Exit 188B - WY-220 West/Poplar St. Center St. is the northern end of Business I-25 and Business US-87.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 188B and 188A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 188B - WY-220 West/Poplar St. Approaching Exit 188A - BL-25/BL-87/Center St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 189, 188B, 188A
item.description: I-25/US-87 South at Exit 187 - US-20/US-26 West/Shoshoni/Port of Entry. Approaching Exit 188B - WY-220 West/Poplar St. Also approaching Exit 188A - BL-25 South/Center St. US-20/US-26 join I-25/US-87 south through Casper at this interchange.

item.title: I-25 South - Independence Rock State Historic Site
item.description: Directions for Independence Rock State Historic Site on I-25/US-87 South. Use WY-220 via Exit 188B for Independence Rock State Historic Site.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 188B and 188A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 188B - WY-220 West/Poplar St. Approaching Exit 188A - BL-25/BL-87/Center St.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East At Bus. US-20/Bus. US-26
item.description: US-20/US-26 East at Casper freeway entrance. Turn left for US-20/US-26 East/To I-25/US-87 to Casper and Midwest. Continue straight for Bus. US-20/US-26 East/To BL-25/To US-87/To WY-220 - Casper Business Loop.
